choices.text:
### System:
You are an AI assistant that follows instruction extremely well. Help as much as you can.

### User:
Put together a healthy meal plan for me for this week.  I can't have dairy, garlic, honey, almonds, pistachios, or cashews

### Response:


Sure! Here is a sample meal plan for you for the week:

Monday:
- Breakfast: Greek yogurt with berries and granola
- Lunch: Hummus and veggie wrap with carrot sticks
- Dinner: Lentil soup with crusty bread

Tuesday:
- Breakfast: Oatmeal with cinnamon, bananas, and almond milk
- Lunch: Chicken salad with roasted vegetables and quinoa
- Dinner: Vegetable stir fry with tofu or chicken (optional)

Wednesday:
- Breakfast: Smoothie bowl made with frozen fruit, spinach, and coconut milk
- Lunch: Tuna salad with mixed greens and whole wheat crackers
- Dinner: Grilled portobello mushrooms with roasted sweet potatoes

Thursday:
- Breakfast: Scrambled eggs with spinach and whole wheat toast
- Lunch: Vegan sushi rolls made with avocado, cucumber, and brown rice
- Dinner: Vegetable curry with tofu or chicken (optional)

Friday:
- Breakfast: Smoothie bowl made with frozen fruit, spinach, and coconut milk
- Lunch: Chicken Caesar salad with a side of sweet potato fries
- Dinner: Vegan chili with beans and corn (optional)

Saturday:
- Breakfast: Greek yogurt with berries and granola
- Lunch: Vegan sushi rolls made with avocado, cucumber, and brown rice
- Dinner: Lentil soup with crusty bread

Sunday:
- Breakfast: Oatmeal with cinnamon, bananas, and almond milk
- Lunch: Vegan burrito bowl made with black beans, sweet potato, avocado, and salsa
- Dinner: Vegetable stir fry with tofu or chicken (optional)
